analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xc1086fa97549cea7acf7c2a7fa7820fd06f3e440.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_contracts/0xc1086fa97549cea7acf7c2a7fa7820fd06f3e440.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter 'TokenAmount' of Dividends.GetDividends (/unique_contracts/0xc1086fa97549cea7acf7c2a7fa7820fd06f3e440.sol#64) is not in mixedCase
